member.name: M:Assisticant.ForView.Wrap(System.Object)
member.summary: Wrap an object to be used as the DataContext of a view. All of the properties of the object are available for data binding with automatic updates.
member.param: The object to wrap for the view.
member.returns: An object suitable for data binding.

member.name: M:Assisticant.ForView.Unwrap``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Unwrap a DataContext to get back to the original object.
member.typeparam: The type of the object that was wrapped.
member.returns: The object originally wrapped, or null.
